status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Run KS
2. Check the label at the bottom of the screen. It keeps showing "tab changed to 1 old index 0".

It's a regression. It does not happen with 2.0.2.
fields.summary: Android: KS: tab focus event keeps being fired

comments.body:
The cause of this bug is how Android now "bubbles" all window events to the tab and tab group.
Requires parity discussion to determine if this is correct behavior.
Note that the above test case is no longer valid.  We decided only to fix the regression that was causing the KS behavior described in the ticket.  So the test should be that KS behavior.

Closing issue

Tested with Ti Studio build 2.1.0.201206172244
Ti Mobile SDK2.1.0.v20120618134156 hash r00905cd0
OSX Lion 10.7.3
Nexus S OS 4.0.4

The expected behavior is shown from the KS test
